reviewText: Bill Burr is not going to be for everyone. He speaks for people that commute to work on long drives and deal with inane people on a daily basis. I find it curious that he has so many 'normal' experiences for a person that works when everyone else is off from work. Clearly he understand the human condition pretty well and his language is mostly under control, but he embraces the concept of language and uses it to his advantage. Very solid stuff.
Title: N/A

reviewText: Note: If you have Amazon prime you can stream this for free just an FYITo me alongside Louis CK, Bill Burr is one of the most on point comedians working today. I've seen all of the special that he's done in my opinion this isn't his best but it still super funny and very enjoyable. I loved it in this one how he introduces us to him getting a dog because he really expands on his dog relationship in his next few specials.The thing I love best about Bill Burr is that he says things that people may get offended about but only if they are complete idiots. And that's why love comedy so much.Thanks for reading!
summary: Bill Burr is one of the best in comedy at the moment.

reviewText: I now own everything that Bill Burr has put out, no matter the form. But I remember when this first came out, I ignored it because I was still enjoying 'Why Do I Do This?' That was real stupid, not to get this, but I actually did not see if until it was put on Netflix. My wife and I laughed uncontrollably. Get it so you laugh out loud and cry yourself silly. Those laughs are always the best kind, so go ahead, Let It Go.

reviewText: this was a one off. i viewed 2 other bill burr standups and they were very average. but this.... i watched it at least 7 times over two weeks this holiday season off of netflix and busted a gut each time. i had to get on amazon and order it for my library. don't know why. its just that good. but again just this one. where is the late richard jeni had 5 standups and each time they got better and better as he honed his skill, this dvd is a stand alone. but its  so good i put it in the top 5 standups i have ever seen. and i have 2500 dvds in my collection.

reviewText: I've been following Bill Burr's career for some years now, and it amazes me how he can keep coming up with better and better material. His perspective on just about anything is insanely funny, and probably more often than not reflects what most of us are thinking but are afraid to say.This DVD is great, especially the story about how Bill acquired his dog. If you like to laugh, pick up this or one of Bill's other DVD's.
summary: Another winner from the funniest comedian alive!

reviewText: By far one of my favorite stand up performances of this decade. This guy is just brutally honest and funny I still quote lines from this to this day and I never get tired of watching it. If you enjoy sarcastic and brutally honest comedy I suggest watching this.

reviewText: I have watched this video over and over and over again, as well as my husband. And it never gets old. I'm DYING for his latest stand-up to be out for sale. I've never laughed so hard, and I'm picky when it comes to comedy routines. Bill Burr has his unique style, and his comedy isn't vulgar (well, maybe a couple swear words here and there). I'd never heard of him but was searching for good stand-up, and am so glad I tried his videos out. Bill Burr is the BEST!
summary: Bill Burr is the BEST comedian - he'll have you in stitches!

reviewText: Let me start by saying I'm a big fan of stand up comedy. From Carlin & Pryor to Hicks & Louis CK, I have seen LOTS of stand up comedy specials. This one, is bar none, the funniest I've ever seen. It's wall to wall laughs. Now, if you don't like the "F" word, then you probably shouldn't be watching adult comedy anyhow. Sinbad is out there for you.Burr's style is conversational and very northeastern. He excels on tapping into the humor that lies just over the line that separates social commentary and the absurdity in every day life. His bit on "do it yourself" check out lanes at the grocery is brilliant. If you love comedy with a hint of an edge that is both witty and intelligent, then I recommend Bill Burr with confidence.
summary: Best Stand Up I've EVER Watched
Title: N/A
